getClassName

public String getClassName()
Full name of the class that implements the cloud driver for this cloud configuration. Class must implement the org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning.ProvisioningDriver interface. Defaults to the value of the DEFAULT_CLOUD_DRIVER_CLASS_NAME constant.

Returns:
the cloud driver class name.
See Also:
ProvisioningDriver
